name: Zombie Martians
description:
Use W  and S to move towards and away from the mouse and A and D to strafe left and right around the mouse, fire towards the mouse with the left mouse button; or just use a 360 controller and the thumb sticks to move/aim and the right trigger to shoot.

Space, Shift, and left Control to change weapons, or the left and right bumpers.

Game is unfinished as I started late and couldn't spend any time on the project on Sunday.

You can't die or lose, there is no goal or menu or score yet, those were all features to be added but again I ran out of time.

The idea was based on a game but also SpaceX. You are an astronaut that landed on mars with SpaceX but we find that in caves and underground zombie martians are roaming about! Luckily you brought a few guns and some ammo, so you can defend you ship and the people inside for as long as possible. (SpaceX and Elon Musk inspire me so I wanted to make an over the top and outlandish game based around that, thus the idea for this twin stick shooter was born).

Art is from OpenGameArt.com

UI by Buch - https://opengameart.org/users/buch

Tileset by MrBeast - https://opengameart.org/users/mrbeast

UI Gun Icons by congusbongus

Sounds from Freesound.org
